name: DATA_BREAK.EXE (DEMO)
description:
DATA_BREAK is a darkly humorous horror RPG, inspired by games like Earthbound, Undertale and LISA: The Painful.

You play as an office drone who lives a seemingly ordinary life, but something isn't right... A mysterious stranger will soon set into motion a series of events that gradually reveal the horrifying truth...

Full Game Features
  • Experience a mundane existence in game, as well as in real life!
  • Get showered, go to work, eat, sleep!
  • A PLAYABLE TOILET!
  • Beat or befriend foes like spiders, the elderly, teens, someone that definitely isn't Mickey Mouse, your boss, and more.
  • Lots of choices, and some that will bite you in the *** later!
  • Care for your cat. Or not because you are heartless POS.
  • An awesome original and authentic 8-bit soundtrack
  • Lots of jokes, references and Easter eggs
  • Multiple endings
  • Learn the meaning of life*

*you might not learn the meaning of life.

Demo Features
  • A small slice of the full game, but it does feature 4 endings. 3 of them are hidden and hard to find (and contain some horrifying things).
  • 11 achievements for the Steam version
